msg: ap_str(case)cmp_match returns the opposite of what is advertized in the header.

msg: If we decrement the counter at accept time and not at close time,

author: jim
msg: pass the provider name to parse_require_line as pool userdata
This allows a single C function to implement several authz providers.

author: jim
msg: Use short lived pool to avoid memory leaks
Remove the comment about binding upstream and downstream connections. It
seems to be obsolete since r104604, r104605, r105108.
Also avoid allocating memory if we are not handling the connection.
